description.en: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +150 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +100 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Charged Power Scroll.
description.ar: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +150 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +100 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Charged Power Scroll.
description.br: Acrescenta +100 de vida (HP) e +100 de Ataque (ATQ) por uma hora. Uma vez desgastado, se torna um Pergaminho do Poder Carregado.
description.cns: HP+150，攻击力+100，持续一小时。 一旦它消失，它就会变成一个可充能的力量卷轴。
description.de: Max HP +150, Angriff +100, hält 1 Stunde. Sobald es abgelaufen ist, verwandelt es sich in eine Charged Power Scroll.
description.fi: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +150 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +100 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Charged Power Scroll.
description.fil: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +150 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +100 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Charged Power Scroll.
description.fr: PV Max +150, Attaque +100. Se transforme ensuite en Secret de puissance majeur.
description.id: Meningkatkan Health Points (HP) sebesar +150 dan Attack Power (ATK) sebesar +100 selama satu jam. Setelah habis, itu menjadi Charged Power Scroll.
description.it: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +150 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +100 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Charged Power Scroll.
description.jp: 1時間、最大HPが+150、攻撃力が+100増加します。効果が切れると、豪傑スクロール(A)が手に入ります。
description.kr: 1시간 동안 체력이 +150, 공격력이 +100 증가합니다. 다 사용하면 충전된 파워 스크롤이 됩니다.
description.nl: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +150 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +100 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Charged Power Scroll.
description.pl: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +150 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +100 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Charged Power Scroll.
description.ru: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +150 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +100 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Charged Power Scroll.
description.sp: Aumenta tus Puntos de Salud (HP) en +150 y tu Poder de Ataque (ATK) en +100 durante una hora. Cuando expira, se convierte en un Pergamino de Poder Cargado.
description.sw: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +150 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +100 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Charged Power Scroll.
description.th: เพิ่มคะแนนสุขภาพ (HP) ของคุณ +150 และพลังโจมตี (ATK) ของคุณ +100 เป็นเวลา 1ชั่วโมง เมื่อมันหมดอายุการใช้งาน มันจะกลายเป็น Charged Power Scroll
description.tw: HP+150和攻擊力+100，持續1小時，時間一到將會變成超級力量卷軸
description.vi: Tăng Điểm máu (HP) của bạn lên +150 và Sức mạnh Công kích (ATK) của bạn lên +100 trong một giờ. Một khi nó bị mòn, nó sẽ trở thành một cuộn đã sạc.
